title: 119: Plato VII: Math till you're thirty.
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Plato finally gets us to the allegory of the cave. We find out that we're just dudes, dudes in a cave, dudes staring at a wall.
itunes:author: A mathematician, A historian, and a third guy.
itunes:subtitle: But up till twenty? only sports.
